item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, November 18, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (244 points | 181 comments)
2. Show HN: FastGraphRAG – Better RAG using good old PageRank (143 points | 38 comments)
3. You Don't Know Jack about Bandwidth (7 points | 1 comment)
4. Fun facts about Google Scholar (110 points | 67 comments)
5. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (86 points | 37 comments)
6. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (167 points | 68 comments)
7. Trieve (YC W24) Is Hiring a software engineer to build OpenAPI tooling ( | hide)
8. Undersea cable between Germany and Finland severed (20 points | 1 comment)
9. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (94 points | 22 comments)
10. Show HN: Tips.io – A Tailwind playground with AI, page management, and theming (146 points | 38 comments)
11. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (106 points | 117 comments)
12. Bird brain from the age of dinosaurs reveals roots of avian intelligence (65 points | 3 comments)
13. Waiting for many things at once with io_uring (44 points | 12 comments)
14. Reactive HTML Notebooks (256 points | 40 comments)
15. Towards Nyquist Learners (24 points | 16 comments)
16. AMD Now Has More Compute on the Top500 Than Nvidia (73 points | 44 comments)
17. LLaVA-O1: Let Vision Language Models Reason Step-by-Step (116 points | 23 comments)
18. A programmable FPGA SoM in the tiny microSD form factor (53 points | 13 comments)
19. Is Chrome the New IE? (2023) (135 points | 166 comments)
20. Extending the context length to 1M tokens (66 points | 89 comments)
21. DNA testing company vanishes along with its customers' genetic data (17 points | 4 comments)
22. Illegally logged wood from Cambodia likely ending up in U.S. homes (83 points | 51 comments)
23. Show HN: Nova JavaScript Engine (217 points | 88 comments)
24. Against Best Practices (181 points | 140 comments)
25. Show HN: Documind – Open-source AI tool to turn documents into structured data (135 points | 39 comments)
26. Libobscura (69 points | 4 comments)
27. An Uncanny Moat (5 points | 3 comments)
28. End-to-End Tour of Text Layout/Rendering (2015) (4 points | discuss)
29. Bhutan, after prioritizing happiness, now faces an existential crisis (213 points | 276 comments)
30. I was banned from the hCaptcha accessibility account for not being blind (2023) (308 points | 217 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, November 18, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
